plot: The Shelf is an animated musical documentary about a child who invents a myth to help him understand the vast differences between himself and his brother.
title: The Shelf
plot_es: The Shelf is an animated musical documentary about a child who invents a myth to help him understand the vast differences between himself and his brother.
plot_en: The Shelf is an animated musical documentary about a child who invents a myth to help him understand the vast differences between himself and his brother.
